japanese: らいはちゃん、今の表情いただきっ！
translation:
Raiha-chan, I'm gonna capture that
great expression of yours!

japanese: えへへ～、なんだかモデルさんになった気分だよ。
translation: Hee-hee-hee, I feel like I've become a model.

japanese: 楽しいでしょ、こういうのも。
translation: This is really fun, isn't it.

japanese:
それにしても、我ながらいいものが撮れたなぁ。
フータロー君垂涎のアルバムができそう。
translation:
But even so, I was able to get some good shots.
I think I'll be able to make an album
that you'll die for, Futaro-kun.

japanese: ふむ、確かに期待が高まるな。
translation: Hmm, you certainly have high expectations.

japanese:
あ、みんなどこに行ってたの？
そろそろ午後の撮影、始めようよ。
translation:
Oh, where have you all been?
It's about time to start our afternoon shoot.

japanese:
ああ、撮影のことで話がある。
だよな、お前ら。
translation:
Yeah, we have something we'd like to discuss
about the afternoon shoot.
Right, you guys?

japanese:
ええ？　なに？
まさか、今度は私にモデルになれって
言いたいのかな？
translation:
Huh? What is it?
Do you perhaps want me to be a model next?

japanese:
でも、まだ私はカメラマンとして
みんなの魅力を引き出せてないから、
交代はできないよ。
translation:
However,
I haven't been able to bring out everyone's charm
as a photographer yet, so I can't switch out.

japanese: やはり、一筋縄ではいきそうにありません。
translation: Yep, it seems we can't use any normal method.

japanese: こうなったら、フー君の作戦でいくしかないわ。
translation: In that case, we have to go with Fu-kun's strategy.

japanese:
一花、想い出のアルバムのことなんだけど。
少し中身を変えたい。
translation:
Ichika, about the memorial album,
we want to change the contents a little bit.

japanese: どういうこと？
translation: What do you mean?

japanese:
もちろん、この島での想い出を残すのは当然よ。
ただ他にも、もうちょっと別の意味を持たせたいの。
translation:
Of course, we want it to contain
our memories of this island.
But, we also want it to have a different meaning.

japanese: へー、別の意味ってなんだろ。
translation: Hmm, what do you mean by a different meaning?

japanese:
一花はこのまま、
女優のお仕事を続けていくんだよね？
translation:
You're going to continue your work
as an actress like this, right, Ichika?

japanese:
それは、もちろん。
女優が私の目指す道だから。
translation:
Of course.
I'm aiming to becoming an actress.

japanese:
だったら、いずれあなたは
『女優の中野一花』になってしまいます。
『みんなの中野一花』に。
translation:
Then eventually, you will be 'Actress Nakano Ichika.'
'Everybody's Nakano Ichika.'
Wha...

japanese:
だから、その前に『五つ子の一花』としての
写真集を作りたい。
ううん、作らせてほしい。
translation:
So, before that, we want to make an
'Ichika of the Quintuplets' photo book.
No, we want you to let us make it.

japanese: 私たちだけが知っている一花を残させて。
translation:
We want to have the Ichika that only WE know
remain with us.

japanese:
これから先、一花が
世界的な女優になったとしても――
translation:
Even if you become a world-class actress in the future,
Ichika%p-2;――

japanese:
私たちは五つ子で、
一花が私たちのお姉さんであることに
変わりはないよね？
translation:
We're quintuplets and you're still our older sister,
right?

japanese:
その証拠に、
今この瞬間の一花を残しておきたいんだ。
translation:
As proof of that,
we want to have these moments of you remain.

japanese:
そうです。
五つ子の一花を、確かなものとして
残しておきたいのです。
translation:
That's right.
We want Ichika, one of us quintuplets,
to remain with us as a definite memory.

japanese: みんな……。
translation: Everybody...

japanese:
な、なんだか、妙に格好つけて
言ってしまいましたが――
translation: W-we kind of said it in a strange way, but%p-2;――

japanese: こういうものは、ちゃんと伝えるべきでしょう？
translation: We should get our feelings across here as well, right?

japanese:
いつか言えなくなっちゃうかもしれない。
そんなの想像したくないけどね。
translation:
Maybe one day, we won't be able to tell you anyway.
I don't want to imagine that, though.

japanese:
そ、そんな感じなんだけど？
どうなの？
translation:
Th-that's how we feel, alright?
So?

japanese:
あはは……。
参っちゃったなぁ。
translation:
Hahaha...
Well, what do I do here.

japanese:
私はさ、みんなと姉妹であることは
ずっと変わらないって思ってた。
だって五つ子だもん。
translation:
I thought that being sisters
with everyone would never change.
I mean, we're quintuplets and all that.

japanese:
なのに、なんだろ……。
その事実に、ちょっと、甘えちゃってたのかな。
translation:
But, well...
I guess I was a little spoiled by that fact.

japanese:
そしてその甘えが、みんなを余計に
不安にさせちゃってたんだね。
translation:
And me being spoiled
really caused all of you to be extra anxious.

japanese: お姉ちゃんなのに、ダメダメだなぁ私。
translation: I really screwed up, as your big sister.

japanese: そんなダメな姉をフォローするのも妹の勤めよ。
translation:
It's the job of your little sisters
to follow up on that big sister's screw-up.

japanese:
というか、
ダメダメじゃない一花は一花じゃないと思う。
translation:
It's more like,
Ichika who isn't screwing up
isn't very much like Ichika.

japanese: ええー……。
translation: Whaaa?

japanese: でも、部屋の掃除はしてほしいかな？
translation: But, I would like you to clean your room, though.

japanese:
そうですね。
せめて洗濯物は出してください。
translation:
That's right.
And at least put out your laundry for wash.

japanese:
ん……。
ありがとね、みんな。
あと、ごめんね。
translation:
Hm...
Thank you all, everyone.
And, I'm sorry.

japanese: 一花、私たちが聞きたいのはそれじゃないわ。
translation:
Ichika, that's not what we want to ask you about,
though.

japanese: あ、そっか。
translation: Ah, I see.

japanese:
みんなにここまで言われときながら嫌だなんて、
言えるわけないよ。
translation: I can't refuse after you've all told me so much.

japanese:
今日この瞬間の『中野一花』を、
みんななりに切り取って、私に見せてほしい。
translation:
I want everyone to showcase out their moment of
'Nakano Ichika' today and show it to me.

japanese: 私が、みんなにとって、どんなお姉ちゃんなのかを。
translation:
What kind of sister am I to everyone?
That's what I want to see.

japanese: 一花……。
translation: Ichika...

japanese:
ふふん、任せなさい。
最高に映える写真を撮ってあげるから。
translation:
Hm-hm, leave it to me.
I'll take the most attractive pictures of you.

japanese: うん、映えだね！
translation: Yeah, good enough to post online!

japanese: プロのカメラマンの方々にも、気持ちは負けませんよ。
translation:
We've got the passion to take photos
like professional photographers!

japanese:
ふふ、だね。
気持ちが大事だもんね。
translation:
Teehee, I can see that.
Passion sure is important.

japanese:
ところで？
さっきからドヤ顔してるフータロー君？
translation:
By the way.
Futaro-kun,
you've had a self-satisfied look for a while.

japanese: あ、お構いなく。
translation: Ah, don't worry about me.

japanese:
どう見ても黒幕なポーズをして、
なに言ってるのかな？
translation:
What are you saying?
Playing it off as if you weren't the
mastermind of this whole plot.

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、みんなの後ろで腕組んで、
悪い顔してたもんねー。
translation:
Big bro, you had your arms crossed,
standing behind everybody and
had with an evil look in your eyes.

japanese: これって、フータロー君の入れ知恵だね？
translation: This was your idea, huh, Futaro-kun.

japanese: ああ、その通りだ！
translation: Yeah, that's right!

japanese:
やっぱりね。
まったくもう、少しは隠そうとしたらどう？
translation:
As I expected.
My goodness, why don't you try HIDING it?

japanese:
どうせ、あとから四葉あたりがバラすだろ？
こんなに上手くいくとは思ってなかったけどな。
translation:
I'd just be outed by Yotsuba or something after.
I didn't think it would go this well, though.

japanese: なんのことだ？
translation: What are you talking about?

japanese: もう、とぼけちゃって。
translation: Oh, don't play dumb!

japanese:
いやいや、とぼけてなんてないぞ。
一花を説得したのは、どう見てもこいつらだ。
だよな？
translation:
No no, I'm not playing dumb.
No matter how you look at it, your sisters
were the ones to convince you, right?

japanese:
んー、まあ、そうだけど。
君って黒幕役には向いてないなぁ。
translation:
Hm, well, I guess so.
You really aren't meant to be a mastermind.

japanese: 俺はちょっと意見しただけさ。
translation: I just gave a small suggestion, that's all.

japanese: もう、かっこつけちゃってさ。
translation: You're just trying to be cool.

japanese:
立場としてはお前と同じだ。
こいつらの熱意に動かされただけだからな。
translation:
I'm in the same position as you.
I was just driven by their enthusiasm.

japanese:
うん……。
そういうことにしとく。
translation:
Okay...
I'll leave it at that.

japanese:
では、さっそく撮影開始ですね。
急ぎましょう、もうあと半日しかありませんよ。
translation:
Then, let's go ahead and start the photoshoot.
Let's hurry, we only have half a day left.

japanese: うん、よろしくね。
translation: Okay, I leave it in your hands.

japanese: ああ！
translation: Yeah!
